channel.title: CiTR -- Pacific Pickin'
channel.description: Pacific Pickin' brings you the best in bluegrass plus its roots and branches: old time, classic country, rockabilly, western swing and
channel.itunes:summary: Pacific Pickin' brings you the best in bluegrass plus its roots and branches: old time, classic country, rockabilly, western swing and
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: The best in bluegrass, old time, classic country, rockabilly and western swing.

item.title: Broadcast on 25-Nov-2014
item.description: Artist feature is in honour of the birthday of Fiddlin' Eddie Stubbs!

item.title: Broadcast on 18-Nov-2014
item.description: Artist Feature is in honour of the birthday of Larry Cordle. Lots of new music too!

item.title: Broadcast on 11-Nov-2014
item.description: Artist features in honour of Remembrance Day and Caleb Klauder coming to Vancouver.

item.title: Broadcast on 04-Nov-2014
item.description: Artist feature is in honour of the birthday of Allen Mills of the Lost and Found!

item.title: Broadcast on 28-Oct-2014
item.description: Artist features in honour of the induction of Mac Wiseman into the Country Music Hall of Fame and the passing of Paul Craft.

item.title: Broadcast on 14-Oct-2014
item.description: Artist feature is in honour of the 100 year anniversary of the birth of Lester Flatt which was celebrated last weekend in Sparta, Tennessee. There's lots of new music too!

item.title: Broadcast on 07-Oct-2014
item.description: Lots of new music today. Our artist feature was in honour of some of the winners at last week's IBMA Awards.

item.title: Broadcast on 30-Sep-2014
item.description: Artist Feature is in honour of the Delmore Brothers, Distinguished Achievement Award winners at this year's IBMA. Plus we have some classic Seldom Scene too as they get inducted into the IBMM Hall of Fame.

item.title: Broadcast on 23-Sep-2014
item.description: Artist feature is in memoriam for the late Larry McPeak. Plus lots of new music.

item.title: Broadcast on 16-Sep-2014
item.description: Artist feature is in honour of the birthday of Hank Williams! Live radio transcriptions!

item.title: Broadcast on 09-Sep-2014
item.description: Annual Bill Monroe Birthday Bash! It's hard to believe he's been gone for 18 years.

item.title: Broadcast on 02-Sep-2014
item.description: Artist feature is a late Labour Day feature! Tune in next week for our annual Bill Monroe Birthday Bash!

item.title: Broadcast on 26-Aug-2014
item.description: Artist Feature is in honour of the True North Fraser Bluegrass Festival coming up this weekend. We dedicate this show to the late Ron Murphy.

item.title: Broadcast on 19-Aug-2014
item.description: Artist feature includes artists coming to the Nimble Fingers Bluegrass Festival this weekend!

item.title: Broadcast on 12-Aug-2014
item.description: Artist feature is in honour of the birthday of the late great Jimmy Martin featuring some rare live recordings!

item.title: Broadcast on 29-Jul-2014
item.description: Artist Feature is for artists appearing at the Coombs Bluegrass Festival this coming weekend. Lots of new music too!

item.title: Broadcast on 22-Jul-2014
item.description: Artist Feature includes some of the bands coming to the Columbia Gorge Bluegrass Festival this weekend.

item.title: Broadcast on 15-Jul-2014
item.description: Artist feature includes the three headliners appearing at the Darrington Bluegrass Festival this coming weekend!

item.title: Broadcast on 08-Jul-2014
item.description: Artist feature was Joe Mullins and the Radio Ramblers who will be coming to the Darrington Bluegrass Festival.

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Jul-2014
item.description: Artist Features today are in honour of Canada Day and in Memoriam for the late Jimmy C. Newman.

item.title: Broadcast on 17-Jun-2014
item.description: Artist feature is in honour of the birthday of Stringbean. Lots of birthdays to celebrate and some new music.

item.title: Broadcast on 10-Jun-2014
item.description: Artist feature is in memory of the late James Alan Shelton.

item.title: Broadcast on 03-Jun-2014
item.description: Artist feature is in honour of the birthday of Larry Perkins. Also a two song memorial for Jerry Sullivan. Plus lots more new and old music!

item.title: Broadcast on 27-May-2014
item.description: Artist Feature is in honour of the birthday of Jerry "Flux" Douglas!

item.title: Broadcast on 20-May-2014
item.description: Artist feature is in honour of the birthday of Voice with a Heart, Mr. Mac Wiseman!

item.title: Broadcast on 13-May-2014
item.description: Artist feature is in honour of the birthday of Red Smiley!

item.title: Broadcast on 06-May-2014
item.description: Artist feature is a memorial to the late Lester Armistead. Plus, lots of songs about Mother in honour of Mother's Day!

item.title: Broadcast on 29-Apr-2014
item.description: Artist Feature is Kathy Kallick who is coming to the area this week! Lots of new music too.

item.title: Broadcast on 22-Apr-2014
item.description: Artist feature is in honour of the birthday of Ira Louvin.

item.title: Broadcast on 15-Apr-2014
item.description: Artist feature was in memory of the late George Shuffler. Lots of new music too!

item.title: Broadcast on 08-Apr-2014
item.description: Artist Feature is in honour of the Steeldrivers coming to the area this week!

item.title: Broadcast on 18-Mar-2014
item.description: Artist feature is Chris Jones and the Night Drivers, coming to town next week!

item.title: Broadcast on 11-Mar-2014
item.description: Artist feature is Comic Relief - comedy in Bluegrass and Country Music!

item.title: Broadcast on 04-Mar-2014
item.description: It's our annual fundraising show! Lots of good music too!

item.title: Broadcast on 25-Feb-2014
item.description: Artist feature today is April Verch in honour of her visit to our area this week. We also feature Wintergrass artists.

item.title: Broadcast on 18-Feb-2014
item.description: Artist Feature is in honour of the birthday of Don Rigsby. We also had lots more birthdays to celebrate and lots of new music.

item.title: Broadcast on 11-Feb-2014
item.description: Artist feature is in honour of Valentine's Day! We saluted lots of birthdays and had quite a lot of new music!

item.title: Broadcast on 04-Feb-2014
item.description: Artist feature is a memorial to Pete Seeger featuring music from Smithsonian Folkways "American Ballads". Plus lots of new music and birthday salutes.

item.title: Broadcast on 28-Jan-2014
item.description: Artist feature is Clayton McMichen in honour of his birthday. Lots of old-time fiddling on this show!

item.title: Broadcast on 21-Jan-2014
item.description: Artist feature is in honour of the birthday of Charlie Waller!

item.title: Broadcast on 07-Jan-2014
item.description: Lots of Birthdays to celebrate today--we are featuring Earl Scruggs in honour of his! Also saluting the Everly Brothers.

item.title: Broadcast on 31-Dec-2013
item.description: Today's show, first broadcast on New Year's Eve day includes some of our favourites from either the Bluegrass Unlimited Charts from 2013 or recordings released (or rereleased) in 2013. Apologies to those omitted. There was A LOT of great music made this year thank goodness!

item.title: Broadcast on 24-Dec-2013
item.description: Our Christmas Extravaganza featuring the beautiful, the wacky, and the downright weired Christmas music. A good time had by all.

item.title: Broadcast on 17-Dec-2013
item.description: Artist feature is in honour of the birthday of Wilf Carter...plus more new music and Christmas music to enjoy!

item.title: Broadcast on 10-Dec-2013
item.description: Artist feature is in honour of Bluegrass recordings nominated for the Grammys.

item.title: Broadcast on 26-Nov-2013
item.description: Lots of new music today and our artist feature was new Christmas music to start the month before Christmas.

item.title: Broadcast on 19-Nov-2013
item.description: Artist feature is in honour of the birthday of Tom Adams!!

item.title: Broadcast on 05-Nov-2013
item.description: Artist Feature is honour of the birthday of Junior Sisk featuring his new album with Joe Mullins.

item.title: Broadcast on 29-Oct-2013
item.description: Artist feature is in honour of Halloween.

item.description: Artist feature is in honour of the birthday of Eric Gibson.

item.description: Lots of new music this week plus our artist feature: Tony Rice in honour of his induction into the Bluegrass Music Hall of Fame!

item.description: Artist Feature is in honour of Paul Warren, recent inductee into the International Bluegrass Music Hall of Fame + much more.

item.description: Artist feature is in honour of the birthdays of Roy Acuff and Hank Williams!

item.description: It's our annual Bill Monroe Birthday Bash Extravaganza! Lots of Bill Monroe and people playing and singing Bill Monroe songs!

item.description: Artist feature is Buzz Busby in honour of his birthday. Plus, we are celebrating birthdays of some classic country artists and of course, we have lots of Bluegrass!

item.title: Broadcast on 25-Nov-2008
item.description: We're celebrating the second week of our annual fund raiser! We still have some CDs (one CD for a $30 donation, 2 for $60, etc.) for our donors as well as the IBMA Experience Backpack (for one donation of $101.90)! Call 604-822-8648 or donate at www.citr.ca! We will mail our prize packs to our donors. Let us know at pacificpickin@yahoo.com how much you donated and we'll arrange everything.
item.itunes:subtitle: Week 2 of Fundrive

item.title: Broadcast on 18-Nov-2008
item.description: Week 1 of our annual fund drive at CiTR! We have lots of giveaways! Podcast listeners from anywhere in the world are eligible! Just go to www.citr.ca to donate and email us as pacificpickin@yahoo.com and we'll arrange your giveaway.

item.title: Broadcast on 21-Nov-2006
item.description: Our second week of our first ever fund drive at CiTR. Lots of great music! We even have special additional pledge premiums for our podcast listeners. Email us at pacificpickin@yahoo.com if you have made an on-line pledge at the $45 level or higher and I'll let you know which premiums are still available. Thanks for listening and your support.

item.description: Our first ever pledge drive at CiTR and we got a chance to put some more of our favourite music on for our listeners!
